learn-ethereum: Learn Ethereum and web3 from A to Z in <underline>Turkish</underline> from the experts in the heart of Istanbul!

students.title: Students
students.cta: Understand the significance of Ethereum and web3. Network with other students and numerous university blockchain clubs. Engage with industry experts, listen to their career journeys, and explore the opportunities within the ecosystem.

developers.title: Developers
developers.cta: Discover how to create decentralized applications and smart contracts. Network with other developers and the Ethereum community. Engage with industry experts, listen to their career journeys, and explore the opportunities within the ecosystem.

researchers.title: Researchers
researchers.cta: Dive into the interesting research topics within the ecosystem. Collaborate with fellow researchers and the Ethereum community. Engage with industry experts, listen to their career journeys, and explore the opportunities within the ecosystem.

finance.title: Finance Professionals
finance.cta: Learn about decentralized finance (DeFi), the current state of apps, and the direction of the ecosystem. Engage with industry experts, listen to their career journeys, and explore the opportunities within the ecosystem.

regulators.title: Regulators
regulators.cta: Gain insights on the Ethereum ecosystem and the legal frameworks. Engage in meaningful discussions with fellow regulators and the Ethereum community. Engage with industry experts, listen to their career journeys, and explore the opportunities within the ecosystem.

anyone.title: Anyone curious!
anyone.cta: Understand decentralized applications and smart contract work. Collaborate with the Ethereum community. Engage with industry experts, listen to their career journeys, and explore the opportunities within the ecosystem.

FAQItems.a: Devcon is the Ethereum Foundation’s annual conference, where we educate and empower our community to build decentralized applications, and bring Ethereum protocols, tools, and culture to the world. This year, we are hosting a series of Devcon events around the world, and we are excited to bring Devcon to Turkey for the first time!

Ethereum is a global, open-source platform for decentralized applications. On Ethereum, you can write code that controls digital value, runs exactly as programmed, and is accessible anywhere in the world.

ETHGünü is a one-day event that will introduce Ethereum and web3 to the Turkish community. The event will feature talks and workshops from Ethereum experts, and will be a great opportunity to connect with the Ethereum community in Turkey.

FAQItems.q: What am I goint to learn at ETHGünü?
FAQItems.a: You will learn about Ethereum and web3 from the experts, and get a taste of the opportunities in the ecosystem. You will also have the opportunity to connect with the Ethereum community in Turkey.

FAQItems.q: Will there be discussions or tips on pricing and trading of cryptocurrencies?
FAQItems.a: No. ETHGünü is an educational event, and will not feature discussions or tips on pricing and trading of cryptocurrencies.

FAQItems.q: What is the language of the event?
FAQItems.a: The event will be mostly in Turkish.
Yes, there will be simulataneous translation from Turkish to English, and vice versa

FAQItems.q: When are tickets going on sale?
FAQItems.a: Tickets are not on sale yet. Please sign up for our mailing list to be notified when tickets go on sale.
